mapper.sql: widgetsourceid, orgid, name, uri, description, createtime, createstaffid
mapper.select: select count(1) from widgetsource where orgid=#{orgid}
mapper.delete: delete from widgetsource where widgetsourceid in (#{ids})
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into widgetsource
orgid,
name,
uri,
description,

createstaffid,

mapper.update:
update widgetsource
orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uri = #{uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createstaffid = #{createstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where widgetsourceid = #{widgetsourceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update widgetsource set orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uri = #{uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createstaffid = #{createstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where widgetsourceid = #{widgetsourceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
